name: Sänka Viking
description:
Ludum Dare 40 Game:
The more weight you have, the worse it is. Try to weigh the other ship down with your cannonballs so that they fall over and you can steal all their treasure. 

Music: Jamie Nord - Royalty Free Music. 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX4SQvYS3mX-pGoixOaCj9w
